class.name: PIXI.BitmapFontLoader

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: The url of the sprite sheet JSON file

parameters.name: crossorigin
parameters.help: Whether requests should be treated as crossorigin

class.help:
The xml loader is used to load in XML bitmap font data ('xml' or 'fnt')
To generate the data you can use http://www.angelcode.com/products/bmfont/
This loader will also load the image file as the data.
When loaded this class will dispatch a 'loaded' event

private.name: onLoaded
private.help: Invoked when all files are loaded (xml/fnt and texture)

private.name: onXMLLoaded
private.help: Invoked when the XML file is loaded, parses the data.

public.name: baseUrl
public.help: [read-only] The base url of the bitmap font data

public.name: crossorigin
public.help: Whether the requests should be treated as cross origin

public.name: texture
public.help: [read-only] The texture of the bitmap font

public.name: url
public.help: The url of the bitmap font data
